Bien décidée à prendre le voleur sur le fait, Canette élabore un piège méticuleux où elle a la mauvaise surprise de découvrir son ami le sanglier à l'aurore suivante! La cane n'est heureusement pas rancunière et invite le malfrat à sa table ... une fois sa bêtise réparée, bien entendu! Un petit jeu d'association ainsi qu'une double page documentaire sur le mode de vie du sanglier (reproduction et croissance, habitat, alimentation et prédation) closent le tout. [SDM].

Une gentille petite leçon d'honnêteté professée à travers un texte tout simple qui est fort joliment illustré de peintures brossées d'un trait rebondi dans une palette lumineuse. Soulignons que le texte au vocabulaire soutenu du dossier final tranche nettement avec celui, très naïf, du récit dont certains mots ont été rehaussés de couleur de manière un peu aléatoire. [SDM].

title: Cendrillon
subjects: Romans, nouvelles, etc. pour la jeunesse
description: "Voici à quoi pourrait ressembler l'histoire de Cendrillon, si celle-ci vivait à notre époque. Un conte qui ne se démode pas." Réf. La Sélection de livres pour enfants de Communication-Jeunesse 2000-2001.

title: The charm bracelet
description: Many years ago she was sent one mysteriously, just a single charm attached. Some time later another charm appeared, and the same thing happened a number of times over the years until the bracelet was almost full. Each charm proved significant too, as if her anonymous benefactor knew she needed a little bit of magic in her life. So when Holly stumbles across another bracelet - one that somebody else has lost - she recognises a lifetime spelled out through the charms, and knows she must try to reunite it with its owner. Using each charm to help discover more about the bracelet's owner, Holly gradually begins to piece together details of this other charmed life. But her quest leads her somewhere she never expected ...

title: Crime Scenes
description: Crime Scenes zooms in on tiny things - such as hair, skin, broken glass and dust - that reveal the truth about crimes. Learn about the bacteria that tell scientists where someone was killed, and meet the maggots that tell police the time of death.

title: David Beckham
description: The story of the early years of David Beckham, and his break through into Manchester United's first team. Suggested level: primary, intermediate.

title: Don't call me fat!
description: Childhood obesity is explored in a way that encourages positive interaction among children, parents, and teachers.

title: Energy food
description: Energy Food is a tailor-made collection of recipes designed to boost your energy for an active, busy life and to improve your general sense of well being.

title: Excel 2003 dian zi biao ge chu li
subjects: Dian zi biao ge xi tong
description: Ben shu quan mian xi tong di jiang jie Excel 2003 de gong neng yu ying yong, Bao kuo gong zuo bu he gong zuo biao de ji chu zhi shi, Chuang jian he bian ji gong zuo biao, Gong shi he han shu de ying yong, Tu biao he tu xing deng.

title: Excel 2010 shu ju chu li yu fen xi cong ru men dao jing tong
description: Ben shu nei rong bao kuo Excel shu ju chu li yu fen xi de ji chu zhi shi, Gong shi yu han shu de shi yong ji chu, Ru he shi yong tu biao lai zeng qiang shu ju fen xi de shuo fu li, Excel zhong ge lei han shu de shi yong fang fa, Tu biao de shi yong ji qiao, Shu ju tou shi biao yu tou shi tu de yun yong, Shi yong hong yu VBA shi xian zi dong hua fen xi, Shu zu yu xun huan yin yong de shi yong, Shi yong VBA zi ding yi han shu de fang fa yi ji shu ju chu li de diao shi yu ce shi.

title: Frame>by>frame baking
description: A visual step-by-step guide to mastering the art of cooking. Fantastic photography allows for at-a-glance clarification of each recipe step. Contemporary design and stylish layout makes for a truly beautiful book.

title: Giving account
description: An inspiring story of God's faithfulness and provision in the life of one servant and faithful steward. From a small town in Southern Illinois to a calling for the world, Giving Account shows how a surrendered life can be used to build a portfolio of eternal riches.--t.p.

title: Goosebumps, collection 15
description:
How to kill a monster. 
Legend of the lost legend. 
Attack of the Jack-O'-Lanterns.

title: Guo ji jin rong
description: Ben shu fen bie jiang shu le:guo ji shou zhi, Wai hui yu hui lü, Wai hui jiao yi, Wai hui feng xian deng nei rong.

title: Gu xi la
description: Ben shu yan jiu le gu xi la de wen ming shi, Nei rong bao kuo"wen ming huo ju de sheng qi yu xi mie", "can lan de qing tong shi dai", "tian shang ren jian", "tan suo de ji qing"deng.

title: Gypsy legacy
description: One promise, two pendants love that was destined to be. Lady Christina Kenton's life is turned upside down when her gypsy great-grandmother gives her a pendant, along with a deathbed request Tina must promise to marry only the man wearing its mate. Jay Collings, now the Marquis of Thanet, returns to England after an eighteen-year absence to honor a promise to a gypsy who once aided him, only to discover he must break his vow in order to secure his inheritance. The last thing he wants is a wife chosen by the father he despised. Tina's gentle strength touches Jay in ways no other woman has. Jay and Tina's destinies may be entwined but will they live long enough to fulfill them? Warnings: The title contains mild violence at the hands of pistol-wielding gentlewomen, unmentionables found in public places, a bitter and vindictive old woman, some laugh-out-loud moments, and other situations that may shock women of Victorian sensibilities!

title: Hey leader, wake up and hear the feedback!
description: Thousands of working individuals from a full range of professions, experiences, and geographic locations were surveyed and asked one simple question: Based on your experience, what is it that truly effective and highly respected leaders DO?

title: Histoire du temps présent
description: Histoire économique, sociale, culturelle, politique, histoire des arts et de la pensée, histoire de la science et de la technologie, par des textes d'époque, des analyses d'historiens, des tableaux, des graphiques, des cartes, des photos d'archives, etc. [SDM].

title: Home baking
description: Over 170 baking recipes from around the world.

title: How to make curtains
description: Rebecca Yaker, co-author of the best-selling One-Yard Wonders, offers this complete introduction to making your own curtains, covering everything from measuring to calculating yardage, choosing the best fabrics, sewing your curtains, adding linings, and selecting the right fixtures and hardware for hanging. She includes step-by-step instructions for making five different curtain styles: pleats, eyelets, tab tops, tie tops, and rod pockets.

title: How to talk to your child
description: Parents are increasingly concerned not so much about educational issues as behavioural ones, and don't know where to turn for advice. Schools are under growing pressure to provide support, information and reassurance on a wide range of subjects from keeping rooms tidy to explaining national disasters such as the July 2005 bombings in London. This book explains how to talk to children up to the age of 11. It provides practical, easy to use, non-judgmental guidance as to how parents should address today's complex challenges as they strive to make sense of the world for their young children. Issues covered include: faiths, beliefs and myths; rights and respect for others; milestones - birthdays, moving house, starting school; practical matters and house rules - going out alone, mobile phones, pocket money, pets; behaviour - telling the truth, stealing; family relationships and issues, including disability; dealing with emotions, including fears; health, safety and hygiene; and the wider world - conservation, global warming, poverty, privilege.

title: Jesus and Christianity
description: Find out all about the life of Jesus and how his teachings developed into the religion now known as Christianity.

title: Juist en Tweemeter
description: Juist droomt ervan profvoetballer te worden, maar hij is erg klein en wordt daarom gepest. Gelukkig helpt zijn oppas Tweemeter hem om voor zichzelf op te komen. Vanaf ca. 10 jaar.

title: La douleur chronique
description: Ecrit dans un langage simple, ce livre met l'accent sur les techniques pratiquées à la clinique Mayo et dans d'autres centres pluridisciplinaires. La compréhension, les cycles, les conséquences, le contrôle de la douleur y sont tour à tour abordés.

title: La folle journée de Mme Sage
description:
Réédition. Depuis sa création en 1971 par un auteur britannique (et sa publication en français au début des années 1980), cette collection n'a cessé de ravir les jeunes lecteurs. Chaque titre qui la compose propose une courte fiction articulée autour d'un personnage masculin ou féminin dont les aventures permettent de jeter un regard humoristique sur un trait de caractère. Le texte, simple et dynamique, se clôt généralement sur une chute rigolote et est accompagné d'illustrations minimalistes, donnant vie à de sympathiques personnages tout en rondeurs, qui servent le propos avec une fraîcheur enfantine. [SDM].

Une belle façon de rire de nos petits travers. [SDM].

title: La Grèce ancienne
description: Documentation élémentaire sous forme de questions-réponses, illustrée d'exemples simples et explicites. Texte dense. Présentation désuète. _U.

title: La nutrition
description: Introduction générale à la nutrition. Informations sur les divers nutriments qui composent les aliments : glucides, lipides, protéines, minéraux et eau. Données de base sur les groupes d'aliments qui font partie du ##Guide alimentaire canadien##. [SDM].

title: La percepción moral
description: Audi describe los elementos experienciales de la percepción y explica cómo la percepción moral puede justificar los juicios morales, proporcionar conocimiento moral y contribuir a la objetividad de la ética.

title: The last days of Leda Grey
description: During the oppressive heat wave of 1976 a young journalist, Ed Peters, finds an Edwardian photograph in a junk shop in the seaside town of Brightland. It shows an alluring, dark-haired girl, an actress whose name was Leda Grey. Enchanted by the image, Ed learns Leda Grey is still living - now a recluse in a decaying cliff-top house she once shared with a man named Charles Beauvois, a director of early silent film. As Beauvois's muse and lover, Leda often starred in scenes where stage magic and trick photography were used to astonishing effect. But, while playing a cursed Egyptian queen, the fantasies captured on celluloid were echoed in reality, leaving Leda abandoned and alone for more than half a century - until the secrets of her past result in a shocking climax, more haunting than any to be in found in the silent films of Charles Beauvois.

title: Le camp des stars
description: Une aventure des trois espionnes de l'agence Woohp. Un cadeau du petit écran. [SDM].

title: Le retour de Deborah
description: En plus d'un roman bien tramé où une médecin remonte en son proche passé, ce livre offre un excellent documentaire sur le Kenya africain. [SDM].

title: Lesbians rock
description: "Lesbian romance about women of all ages from all walks of life as they meet, build a relationship of love and marriage, whether legally married or living as though married, sharing days and years side by side, caring for the needs of their beloved partner/wife. The stories are intended for lesbians of all ages, Questioning, Just Out and happily joined in a loving relationship. The stories are also for family members and friends of lesbians who desire to understand and accept loving relationships of two people of the same gender. Romantic stories of real life, both the loving happy moments and the conflicts that may arise with any two lovers whether or not they have romantic hearts to love the same gender." --

title: Li shi pang de hua yuan
description: Ben shu shou zuo zhe yin le yi shu ping lun wen zhang 26 pian,Qi zhong bao kuo[Wa ge na zhi mi],[Chai ke fu si ji ru shi shuo],[Ba tuo ke:za jiao ji qi ta],[Zui hou de yi xiang]deng.

title: Little Bat
description: Little Bat doesn't like being different from his bird buddies, but he is able to save them from a forest fire.

title: Li, zui hao de shi guang
description: Nem shu shou ji le sui bi, fang tan lu, xiao shuo, ying shi wen xue zuo pin deng 32 pian.

title: Llyfr hwyl y Lolfa
description: A compilation of Lolfa puzzles, jokes, quizzes and stories for children of all ages. Llyfr llawn hwyl sy'n cynnwys posau, jocs, gemau a storiau am gymeriadau fel Capten Clonc a'r Prif Cop. Oriau o chwerthin i blant o bob oed!

title: Maîtresse en détresse
subjects: Romans, nouvelles, etc. pour la jeunesse
description: Véro, la nouvelle maîtresse qui a remplacé l'enseignante qui devait faire la classe aux petits énervés de quatrième année, cache, tant bien que mal, ses habiletés peu communes : elle est sorcière. D'ailleurs, quand elle s'énerve, elle jette de mauvais sorts aux élèves turbulents. L'un d'entre eux raconte l'année qu'ils ont passée ensemble et comment ils ont apprivoisé mutuellement leurs réaction excessives et leurs écarts de conduite grâce à des exercices de respiration abdominale. -- Un roman simple, assaisonné de magie et d'humour, dans lequel les coquins se reconnaîtront sans problèmes. [SDM].

title: No hay hombres cabrones sino mujeres que los aguantan
description: Ironico, implacable, con humor desbordante sin dejar de lado reflexiones profundas, este libro es la herramienta unica para deshacerte de malos galanes, seductores de quinta y pesimos amantes.

title: OECD economic surveys
description: This first OECD Economic Survey for the Ukraine reviews recent economic developments and points out key economic challenges that Ukraine faces in the medium-term, including reducing barriers to economic growth though institutional and regulatory reform and raising competitiveness. The Survey makes a series of Recommendations.

title: San Pedro y San Juan
subjects: Healing of the lame man by Peter and John (Miracle)
description: Tells how Peter and John spread the word of Christ.

title: Pope's bounty
description: When jaded gun-for-hire, Simeon Pope, takes what he thinks will be a routine job he finds himself working for both sides of a divided family. Confronted by a bad man, a mad man and a law man, Pope struggles to satisfy all his clients, impress the woman he desires, and stay just on the right side of the law.

title: Quatre petits bouts de pain
description: "Ce livre est une méditation, non sur la mort, mais sur la vie. Ce n'est pas un témoignage sur l'expérience de la Shoah comme expérience de la mort, mais un appel à la vie. Un matin, à Auschwitz, une femme mourante demande à Magda Hollander-Lafon d'approcher et lui dit de prendre dans sa main les quatre petits bouts de pain qu'elle a gardés mais qu'elle ne peut plus manger : "Tu es jeune, tu dois vivre", lui dit-elle. Cette phrase a fait renaître Magda, jeune adolescente, plongée dans un enfer qui la happait. D'autres moments de grâce se produiront, symboliquement, avec l'eau, les nuages et un sourire. Ce furent chaque fois des renaissances physiques et spirituelles. De ces instants, qui sont autant de dons, elle livre aujourd'hui un témoignage spirituel d'une magnifique intensité. Il s'adresse à chacun : c'est une invitation à emprunter un chemin de pacification intérieure, de responsabilisation, un chemin vers sa vie. Un chemin qui, n'ignorant rien des ténèbres et de la peur, guide vers la lumière et vers la joie, cette "joie de vivre, qui est le ciel sur la terre"--Résumé de l'éditeur.

title: The Ravenwood Trade
description: Captured by Union forces in the battle of Peachtree Creek, Confederate Chaplain Pat Ravenwood is incarcerated in Clonnerville Prisoner-of-War Camp north of Atlanta. In the squalor of this hell-hole, his faith is shattered by the cruelty of a sadistic Union Sergeant named Buck Hagan. Consumed with hatred, Pat vows to kill Hagan. Upon his release from the prison camp at the end of the war, Pat trades his Bible for a gun and becomes the town marshal in his home town, Pine Creek, Georgia. Later, due to an extraordinary set of circumstances, Pat is named a Deputy U.S. Marshal. In the chaotic aftermath of the fall of the Confederacy, three killers are terrorizing communities in central Georgia. Pat and two other marshals are ordered to bring the killers to justice. When two of the killers are apprehended, Pat's two associates are assigned to other duties, leaving Pat to track down the leader of the gang alone. As he doggedly follows one lead after another, it becomes evident that the man he is pursuing is none other than Buck Hagan, the man he has threatened to kill. The search for the elusive Hagan is time-consuming and hampered by many dead-end leads. Finally, one lead pays off, and Pat comers Hagan in a farm house near the little town of Abbeville, Georgia. With both barrels of his sawed-off shotgun cocked, Pat enters the house and comes face-to-face with Hagan, only to discover that there is one more trade to be made.

title: Resurrection Row
description: Série Charlotte Edisson et Thomas Pitt, tome 4

title: Return of the bandit
description: Villainous bounty hunter Hume Crawford is well-known for his brutal slayings: he will do anything to get his hands on those he seeks. Out to find and kill the legendary bandit Zococa, despite reports of the good-natured rogue's death, Crawford proceeds to shoot his way across the Mexican border. But he has attracted the attention of Marshal Hal Gunn and his deputy Toby Jones. As Crawford follows Zococa's trail, there are two Texas star riders on his ...

title: Robyn Martin's best recipes for crockpots & slow cookers
description: Robyn Martin's no-fuss recipes for crockpots and slow cookers are great for busy people. Her recipes feature soups, chicken, meat, mince and sausages, one-pot meals, vegetarian dishes and desserts to make in this surprisingly versatile appliance.

title: Sans gluten
description: Depuis quelques années, le <<sans gluten>> est à la mode. On assiste à un engouement sans précédent. Est-ce une mode passagère? Peut-on réellement être intolérant au gluten? Cet ouvrage présente des informations fiables et pertinentes rédigées par des diététistes chevronnées.[Présentation de l'éditeur].

title: The school inspector calls!
description: Summer has arrived in Barton-in-the-Dale and as a new term begins at the little primary school, it's not just the warm weather that's getting people hot under the collar. Meetings with the teachers from Urebank School to discuss the merger are producing more than a few fireworks, a disruptive new pupil arrives, set to cause trouble, and a surprising staff love affair is exposed. There's also a big school production of the Wizard of Oz to organise as well as an impending visit from the Minister of Education. Head teacher Elisabeth Devine certainly has her work cut out for her -- book jacket.

title: Secret regrets
description: "Thanks to the www.secretregrets.com project, thousands of people just like you have a safe place to unburden themselves. To take what's eating them up and finally get it off their chests. A chance to finally speak the unspeakable. That's what the Secret Regrets project started out as. But almost instantly, it grew into something much, much bigger. It quickly became a global community of complete strangers anonymously connecting with complete strangers, offering words of compassion, empathy and unconditional support. Allowing people to finally put guilt and regret behind them and move on."--Page 4 of cover.

title: Seeing things
description: Miranda's psychic ability allows her to look into the past, but when her older sister's boyfriend wants to use these abilities Miranda quickly gets the feeling things are out of hand.

title: Sharks
description: Sharks have existed in their current form for over 400 million years and have survived and adapted to the Earth's great climate changes and mass extinctions. Over 400 species are divided across eight orders. Many men and women ply the ocean depths to photograph the many different types of sharks in order for us to become more familiar with one of the most misunderstood animals of our world.

title: Should Canadians have private clinics?
description: Developed in a debate format, each side presents a different perspective on the health care issue relevant to Canada today.

title: Silent killer
description: A twisted murderer is on the loose and punishing priests in Alabama. Danger lurks around every corner. Is anyone safe? Is anyone innocent?

title: Simba's guess who?
description: Having fun with Simba.

title: This time around
description: Dr. Van Jacobs gave his life to save the universe ... or so he thought. Instead, he awakes half-way across the world, floating in the middle of the Indian Ocean on an iceberg when he should have been dead. He's rescued by the team at Station One, but when he finds out what they've been working on, and their plans for the future, he realizes they might not be fighting on the same side any longer.

title: Tristan et Iseult
description: Texte, notes explicatives, questionnaires ...

title: Trois bavards au bord du lac
description: Pour faire peur à Willy pot-de-colle, Lola, Sam et Paul y vont de leurs histoires épeurantes. Rien n'y fait, au contraire.

title: UFOs and aliens
description: From death defying stunts to the volcano's edge, this series will excite and inspire 8 to 11 year olds. High-interest topics grab the reader and introduce key science concepts in an accessible and innovative way.

title: Un cheval en or
description: Californie, 1849. Depuis deux ans, Erika, 14 ans, vit avec son père et son frère dans une bergerie. Ils ont quitté leur Hongrie natale pour venir chercher de l'or aux Etats-Unis. Mais les pépites sont difficiles à dénicher, et l'argent vient à manquer. Erika est embouchée par Hart Latham, le propriétaire d'un ranch. Elle se prend d'affection pour une pouliche blessée, Arany, qu'elle va entourer de ses soins. Et si Arany aidait Erika à trouver de l'or ? (4ème de couverture)

title: Understanding taxes & savings, 2006-2007
description: People lose millions of pounds each year through saving badly and paying too much tax. This text will help readers make the most of their money, and includes sections on tax, savings and more.

title: Untitled Tasmina Perry 2
description: Stunning Olivia Asgill is about to marry into one of the richest and most powerful families in the United States, and matriarch Brooke Asgill is determined that her daughter will walk down the aisle at whatever cost. But the Asgill's are not all they seem and their past is riddled with secrets, lies and tragedy.

title: Valedictory
description: "VALEDICTORY is set at a university in New York in the 1980s during a student takeover that shuts down the campus for three weeks. Earl Castle is an ambitious senior trying to secure the prize of valedictorian. Brilliant and aloof, he cannot, however, stay completely above the turmoils roiling the university. Due to his affection for Calvin Reynolds, one of the student activists, Earl becomes an unwitting participant in the takeover, risking everything he has striven to achieve, and forcing him to choose between the nobility of his feelings for Calvin and his desire for the award he so dearly covets"--Back cover.

title: Walter's wheels
description: Illustrations made from clay and simple, rhyming text reveal a boy's musings on how his cat explores different modes of transportation while the boy is at school.

title: Willie's wagon
description: Willie is bored, as usual. Thats when the first grader discovers an old worn wagon that sparks his imagination. What will he do with the wagon? Can a little boy make a big difference for children fighting cancer? Come along for the ride in Willie's wagon.

title: Ye jing yu qin huang yu xi
description: Ben shu nei rong bao kuo:meng xiang yong yuan zai lu shang, Xing xing xiang rong, Qing chun kai hua de ji jie, Ai sheng kai de sheng yin, Hu die ye neng fei guo cang hai, Qi huan shui jing qiu.

title: Zhong ji shui yuan
description: Ben xiao shuo bao gua luo ke de shi yan, wen ti fa sheng, shi yan jin xing shi, yong chuangFdao, hai yang sheng wu, gong ji lu di, ling yi zhong li liang, zui hou de dou zheng 8 zhang nei rong.

title: Zui qiang da nao jie mi
description: Ben shu shi tu jie kai zui qiang da nao bei hou de mi mi, rang du zhe men le jie dao qi shi xuan shou men de na xie neng li, jue da bu fen shi hou tian jing guo xue xi he lian xi er huo de de, er zhe xie neng li de huo de bing mei you da jia xiang xiang zhong na me nan. zhi yao ni zhang wo le zheng que de fang fa, ran hou duo hua yi xie shi jian xun lian, ni ye neng gou zuo dao na xie kan qi lai bu ke si yi de shi qing.

title: The Complete Works of Shakespeare (Hamlet / King Lear / Othello / Pericles / Romeo and Juliet)
subjects: British and irish drama (dramatic works by one author)
English drama (collections), early modern and elizabethan, 1500-1600
description:
Contains:
Hamlet
King Lear
Othello
Pericles
[Romeo and Juliet](https://openlibrary.org/works/OL362705W)

title: A Royal Romance
description:
Georgina, Princess of Wales, has always known her destiny, but she never expected duty to call so soon. When her father dies suddenly, she is called back from her Royal Navy post to assume the crown. While the people acclaim their new Queen, Great Britain’s first openly gay monarch, all George feels is the isolation of her station.

Beatrice Elliot’s staunch anti-monarchist views have always been a point of gentle contention with her working class, royalty-loving parents. When Bea—director of a hospice charity—must spend six months working with Queen Georgina, her charity’s new patron, sparks fly and passion blooms. But is love enough to bridge the gap between Bethnal Green and Buckingham Palace?

title: The Aftermath of Unrest
description: The Aftermath of Unrest is a one-of-a-kind poetry collection/novella and the second book by NYC poet Natalie Nascenzi. Through a combination of poems, paintings, and short stories; it takes readers on a journey through passing time, the battle of the mind, the lessons of life and finding balance in the chaos of reality. This incredible and true story is captivating from cover to cover and encapsulates the message: Anything is possible, anyone is capable, and even in the darkest of times, there is hope.  The interior contains original paintings paired beautifully with the poems and short stories. The reader is guided through the author's personal experience as she describes her serendipitous experiences before and during the pandemic in New York City.

title: Ronnie and Rosey
description: Just when things are looking up for thirteen-year-old Ronnie, her father dies, creating a void she and her mother have trouble filling.

title: Call of the fiddle
subjects: Romans, nouvelles, etc. pour la jeunesse
description: A young boy embraces his Metis heritage and carries on his family's traditions.

title: De kus van de vampier
description: De in het zwart geklede en zwarte lippenstift gebruikende Raven (16, ik-figuur) is gefascineerd door vampiers en is dan ook nieuwsgierig als in Het Landhuis in hun saaie stadje een geheimzinnige jongen uit Roemenië komt wonen. Vanaf ca. 13 jaar.

title: Building a panel bedroom suite
description: "Solid joinery, commonly found woodworking tools, and timeless design combine to make both the panel bed and armoire described in this book a joy to build. Detailed, easily understood descriptions, accompanied by over 280 clear color photos and 34 detailed plans, explain and show every step of the furniture building process. Most of the joinery is made at the table saw. The moldings are made with a router, using standard bits individually or in combination. Subtle details, which make this bed and armoire unique in their designs, are easily accomplished with commonly found woodshop tools. If you have thought of building a detailed piece of furniture but want something other than Queen Anne or another often repeated period style, this is the book for you"--Page 4 of cover.

title: 366 jours pour réfléchir à notre Terre
subjects: Influence de l'homme sur la nature
description: Ouvrage superbement illustré qui donne à voir de multiples aspects de la Terre vue du ciel, avec un accent sur la diversité des biotopes et les risques que la pollution fait courir à la planète. Pour chaque jour de l'année, une double page : une photographie à droite et son commentaire à gauche. Précédant le début de chaque mois, un court article aborde un sujet à caractère écologique : changement climatique, biodiversité, énergies renouvelables, développement durable, etc. [SDM].

title: A bride for Jason
description: Jason wants to marry Carly, but their families have been feuding for years. When she takes a job with Jason's family her aim is to expose their unsavory dealings. Jason's instincts compel him to question her motives. Will the truth allow him to still make Carly his bride?

title: Voici Edgar Degas
description: A la lumière de quelques tableaux, Anne Newlands s'applique à livrer aux jeunes quelques traits de la personnalité du peintre et son souci artistique. Texte de lecture facile, rédigé dans un style direct. Mise en pages sobre et aérée.

title: The temple of a million years
description: Ramses II is about to reach his coronation. He has all he should need to become the great pharaoh: his wife Nefertari and his mother both love him unconditionally, and he derives great strength from solid friendships he formed in childhood, especially with the Hebrew Moses. And yet still the young pharaoh must fight to hold on to the throne. For lurking all around in the shadows are new conspiracies against Ramses. Will he succeed in avoiding the traps set in his path by his older brother? Can he avert the black magic of a mysterious sorcerer and ward off the schemes of the Hitties?

title: Budget justifications and annual performance plan, fiscal year 2003 [and] annual performance report fiscal year 2001
subjects: United States. Bureau of Land Management
description: Provides an overview of the Bureau of Land Management's (BLM's) budget request for fiscal year 2003. Includes BLM performance report for fiscal year 2001.

title: Valacchia
description: N'ayez pas peur, bel étranger. Vous êtes à Valacchia, et nous-- savourons tous nos visiteurs. Alors qu'ils voyagent en Roumanie, un accident de voiture oblige un jeune couple à trouver refuge dans un manoir décrépit dont l'enseigne craquelée indique Valacchia. Ils hésitent à peine avant d'entrer; ainsi débute une folle nuit pour les deux voyageurs, pénétrant sans le savoir dans l'antre de Dame Chrystabella, l'héritière de la Reine des Morts. Au fil des heures, ils feront la rencontre de créatures aussi charmantes que terrifiantes, des personnages sensuels qui leur feront vivre des expériences voluptueuses, réalisant leurs fantasmes les plus fous. Cette mésaventure se transformera-t-elle en souvenir de voyage-- inoubliable? Il y avait une présence étrange partout autour d'elle, le matelas se pressait dans tous les sens, il y avait ce souffle, ces souffles, à peine audibles et pourtant présents au travers de la brume de sa somnolence, cette étrange sensation de rêver.

title: The cook's tale
description: Nancy Jackman was born in 1907 in a remote Norfolk village. Her father was a ploughman, her mother a former servant who struggled to make ends meet in a small cottage. The pace of life in that long-vanished world was dictated by the slow, heavy tread of the farm horse and though Nancy's earliest memories were of green, sunny countryside still unspoiled by the motorcar, she also knew at first hand the harshness of a world where the elderly were forced to break stones on the roads and where school children were regularly beaten.

title: The electrician's guide to the 17th edition of the IEE wiring regulations BS7671
description: "The Wiring Regulations BS 7671:2008", commonly known as the 17th edition, were released more than 2 years ago. Since then, a series of documents published by the IEE/IET has provided a variety of details missing from the original "BS 7671:2008". This edition puts together the complete information in a practical manner.

title: The philosophical life
description: Before the good life was reduced to a bottle of Prozac, philosophers offered arresting answers to the most fundamental questions about who we are and what makes a life worth living. In The Philosophical Life, James Miller returns to this vibrant tradition with short, lively biographies of twelve famous philosophers, examining the interplay of their life and thought. From Plato, who risked his reputation to tutor a tyrant, to Nietzsche who tried to get to grips with the human condition before lapsing into catatonic madness, Miller lays out the lives and thought of our greatest thinkers with flair and rich anecdote.

title: Some Girls Do
description:
**In this YA contemporary queer romance from the author of *Hot Dog Girl*, an openly gay track star falls for a closeted, bisexual teen beauty queen with a penchant for fixing up old cars.**

Morgan, an elite track athlete, is forced to transfer high schools late in her senior year after it turns out being queer is against her private Catholic school's code of conduct. There, she meets Ruby, who has two hobbies: tinkering with her baby blue 1970 Ford Torino and competing in local beauty pageants, the latter to live out the dreams of her overbearing mother. The two are drawn to each other and can't deny their growing feelings. But while Morgan--out and proud, and determined to have a fresh start--doesn't want to have to keep their budding relationship a secret, Ruby isn't ready to come out yet. With each girl on a different path toward living her truth, can they go the distance together?

title: Finding heroes
description: Be inspired by heroes' stories from real life and from the movies: Ian Thorpe - Liz Ellis - Lleyton Hewitt - Guy Sebastian - Simba - Anne Frank - Charlie - Christopher Reeve - Dorothy - Martin Luther King - Frodo - Louise Sauvage - Nelson Mandela - Shrek - Britney Spears - Harry Potter - Kieren Perkins - Brigitte Muir - Ernest Shackleton - Cathy Freeman - Bill Gates - Nemo.

title: Vikings
description: Beginning in 789AD, the Vikings raided monasteries, ransacked cities and invaded western Europe. They looted and enslaved their enemies. But that is only part of their story. In long boats they discovered Iceland and America (both by accident) and also sailed up the Seine to Paris (which they ransacked). They settled from Newfoundland to Russia, founded Dublin and fought battles as far afield as the Caspian Sea. A thousand years after their demise, traces of the Vikings remain all the way from North America to Istanbul. They traded walruses with Inuits, brought Russian furs to Western Europe and took European slaves to Constantinople. Their graves contain Arab silver, Byzantine silks and Frankish weapons.

title: Irlandeses, Eduardo Casey, vida y obra
description: "Interesting account of Irish colonization in Santa Fe prov. and of Edward Casey (1847-1906), a key pioneer and promoter, who made possible much of the colonization. Of particular interest is the decription of Casey's work at Venado Tuerto, still a major farming and sheepraising center today"--Handbook of Latin American Studies, v. 58.

title: De Turken komen eraan!
description: Analytisch overzicht van de maatschappelijke en politieke verhoudingen in Turkije.

title: Pourquoi les tournesols se tournent vers le soleil?
description: Des réponses simples à des questions élémentaires que se posent les jeunes au sujet des oiseaux, des poissons, des plantes, etc. Chaque thème fait l'objet d'une double page dont la présentation dynamique est rehaussée d'excellentes photographies.

title: Bracelets brésiliens
description:
BRACELET BRESILIEN

75 modèles de bracelets brésiliens, tresses et wraps à réaliser étape par étape. Après quelques conseils généraux sur les fils à utiliser, sur les techniques possibles pour commencer et terminer les bracelets, l'auteur présente d'abord les exemples les plus simples à réaliser, puis les variantes qui complexifient le travail. Bracelets fins, brésiliens zigzag, brésiliens décorés de poissons, croix, losanges et pois, avec des perles ou des breloques, puis les wraps, simples, doublés, croisés...

title: Good night
description: A boy prepares for bedtime, using both English and Spanish phrases.

title: Je grandis
description: Pour satisfaire la curiosité des petits, le professeur Ombilic leur explique les phénomènes de la croissance. Avec des mots simples et justes et des comparaisons toujours amusantes, il décrit aux enfants toutes les transformations qui surviennent dans leur corps au fur et à mesure qu'il grandissent. Du développement moteur au développement cognitif en passant par l'acquisition du langage, l'importance du sommeil et l'alimentation, tout y est pour suivre le cheminement du nourrisson vers l'adolescence.

title: Du duct tape sur notre amour
subjects: Romans, nouvelles, etc. pour la jeunesse
description:
Alors qu'il reçoit Anouk en pleurs, qui lui avoue ne plus vouloir voir son père qui a manifestement abusé d'elle, Martin doit intervenir pour que Pavel puisse à nouveau s'autoguérir. Faisant libérer le père de l'adolescent russe, il permet aux deux immigrants d'organiser leur évasion, ce qui se termine par la prise en otage d'un employé du laboratoire. Mais Anouk, ayant accompagné Martin sur les lieux, est alors aussi prise dans le collimateur de Bourgeois ...

Situant l'action dans un célèbre collège de Montréal du quartier Côte-des-Neiges, un onzième épisode provocateur et empreint d'émotions troubles, s'insérant dans un feuilleton de 13 épîtres aux accents fantastiques, évoquant les sentiments de solitude profonde puis d'amour naissant chez un garçon en proie au désespoir. La narration, très brève, à la première personne, entrecoupée de réflexions rédigées en italique au style direct, présage une série accessible, inspirée des romans graphiques de type manga dont la première illustration, en clair-obscur, établit l'atmosphère. Teintée d'une pointe de science-fiction qui lui procure tout son souffle, cette série hyperréaliste tiendra le lecteur en haleine, malgré le lourd poids qui pèse sur les épaules de son héros. [SDM].

title: Le récit de Noël
description: Le traditionnel récit de la Nativité, narré dans une langue simple et illustré de lumineux pastels réalistes. La couverture est ornée de feuilles dorées scintillantes. [SDM].

title: Trop grand
subjects: Romans, nouvelles, etc. pour la jeunesse
description: Quand on a un nouveau petit frère et qu'on est encore petit, on a bien envie de faire comme le bébé ... A partir de 4 ans.

title: I can make it! I can read it!
description: "Seasonal, student-made booklets; Fun formats just right for beginner readers; Simple text promotes reading success; Curriculum extensions and literature links; ideas for sharing at school and at home."--Cover.

title: Bayou heat
description:
Talon (bk. 5). After the tragic death of his parents when Talon was young, he's dedicated his life to protecting the Pantera. To the strikingly gorgeous man, loyalty and honor mean everything. So it's no surprise that he's determined to treat Isi Rousseau as the enemy. If the elders believe she is a danger then he will do whatever necessary to prevent her from destroying his beloved Wildlands. But discovering the delicate beauty sleeping in his bed, Talon discovers his noble intentions wavering. The female, with short, jet black hair streaked with blue, and a pair of dark eyes, might act tough, but it's obvious to him that she's as desperate as he is for a place to call home. More importantly, her presence is helping keep Ashe and her baby alive. Suddenly things are not quite as black and white as Talon assumed, and he must decide if his loyalty to his people is worth losing his true mate.

Xavier (bk. 6). He shouldn't want his best friend's little sister... The drop-dead gorgeous leader of the Geeks, Xavier has one goal: find the human male his enemies seek. Devoted to his work, and to the Pantera, there is nothing that can distract him from accomplishing his goal. Until he spots his best friend's little sister alone and partying it up with a bunch of human males at the local bar. Consumed with possessiveness, Xavier takes her home and refuses to leave her side until her brother returns. He tries to convince himself he's just looking out for her, but the longer he's around Amalie, the harder it is to deny the molten attraction that burns between them. She has three days to change his mind... Beautiful and strong-willed Hunter, Amalie is free. No brother to tell her what to do, and no Pantera watching over her because she happens to be the last Pantera born. But before she can truly enjoy herself, her brother's best friend tries to put her on lockdown. Xavier has been the star in all of Mal's fantasies, and there's no one she'd rather give her virginity to. But the sexy male refuses to open his eyes and see what's right in front of him. Mal knows she has three days to change his mind. Three days to make him see her as grown, and the one female he can't resist.

title: Bed & breakfast France
description: Specifically chosen for their style and character, all properties featured in this guide are visited by French researchers to ensure a genuine French lifestyle and a great welcome. Each featured listing is fully described, with accompanying photograph, and offers all the essential details readers need to know.

title: The Christ report
description: "A secret kept since the Holy Birth will be revealed when two men, separated by two thousand years in time, search for a meaning greater than themselves. Both suffer from broken hearts, yearn to keep the women they love, and worry about their legacy." -- Cover.

title: La leçon de yoga
description: Toutes les techniques du yoga illustrées pas à pas : leçons de beauté pour être mieux dans son corps, effacer le stress, mieux digérer, vaincre les problèmes de circulation ... Des conseils pour aller plus loin et progresser, perfectionner les postures, comprendre les huit étapes traditionnelles du yoga ... Avec un DVD pour s'initier et s'entraîner.

title: Kuchnia polska
description: Kuchnia polska wchłaniała i adaptowała przez wieki potrawy kuchni francuskiej, włoskiej, litewskiej i żydowskiej. Stanowiąc nieodzowny element kultury polskiej jest świadectwem jej rozwoju oraz rozwoju społeczeństwa. Książka zawiera wiele przepisów na tradycyjne potrawy wraz z kolorowymi fotografiami.

title: I'll run with you
description: I'll Run With You is designed to encourage the reader, that regardless the struggles that they may be going through, that strength can be found. It does this through the real life stories of individuals who while on earth, have struggled physically and although they may limp up to the gates of heaven, they will run on the other side.

title: Rue Planquette
description: Histoire sur le refus du déménagement, du déracinement, du changement ...

title: Parler le langage des anges
description: Ce livre vous apprend à entrer vraiment en relation avec les Anges ! Aucune "salade" inutile, ni promesse "bidon", incitant à manipuler les Anges pour satisfaire vos désirs égoïstes ! NON ! Ce livre s'intéresse sincèrement aux Anges : qui ils sont, où ils vivent, comment ils pensent et quelles sont leurs missions. Voulez-vous connaître et vous rapprocher de votre Ange Guide ? Connaître les clés pratiques pour dévoiler les mystères de votre destinée ? Ce livre éclaire et renouvelle le sentier moderne et accessible qui mène à l'Ange, associant respect du sacré et héroïsme. Découvrez la manière de penser et de méditer, pour vous relier consciemment aux Anges et apprendre à collaborer avec eux, en toute liberté. Les Anges préparent le futur de l'humanité ! Et vous pouvez y participer ! C'est le moment pour choisir d'établir une "communion angélique", une communication "adulte", dans un but évolutif et fraternel. Découvrez les missions des Archanges : Gabriel, Raphaël, Uriel ainsi que Michaël, et un hommage à Isis-Sophia.

title: Boy with Flowers
description:
Ely Shipley's first book of poems, which won the 2007 Barrow Street Press book prize judged by Carl Phillips, the 2009 Thom Gunn Award, and was a Lambda Literary Award finalist. He also won the Utah Writer's Award in Poetry from the Western Humanities Review judged by Edward Hirsch and the Virginia Faulkner Award from Prairie Schooner. He was a finalist for the Academy of American Poets' Levis prize judged by Susan Howe in 2007 and for the James Hearst Award from the North American Review judged by Li-Young Lee in 2003. 

His writing appears in the Western Humanities Review, Prairie Schooner, Willow Springs, Florida Review, Phoebe, Greensboro Review, Painted Bride Quarterly, Hayden's Ferry Review, Diagram, Barrow Street, Third Coast, Gulf Coast, LTTR and Bloom. He holds a PhD in Literature and Creative Writing from the University of Utah. He taught for many years at Baruch College, CUNY and currently teaches at Western Washington University in Bellingham, WA.

title: Weet jij wat Bas zegt?
description: Bas woont naast buurman Fiel. Zij spreken een eigen taal. Bij mooi weer gaan ze naar het strand. A1.

title: Fang di chan qi ye cheng ben kong zhi yu jing xi hua guan li
description: Ben shu zhu yao bao kuo fang di chan qi ye cheng ben kong zhi ti xi de jian li, Fang di chan qi ye tou zi jue ce huan jie cheng ben kong zhi, Fang di chan xiang mu she ji jie duan cheng ben kong zhi, Fang di chan xiang mu zhao tou biao huan jie cheng ben kong zhi, Fang di chan qi ye cai gou cheng ben kong zhi, Fang di chan qi ye gong cheng guan li huan jie cheng ben kong zhi, Fang di chan qi ye cheng ben he suan yu fen xi deng fang mian nei rong.

title: Japon
description: « Isolé des siècles durant à cause de sa situation sur l'anneau de feu du Pacifique, l'archipel du Japon fascine par son caractère énigmatique. Le Guide Voir Japon dresse le portrait d'un pays qui présente un curieux mélange d'ancien et de moderne. La diversité géographique et climatique des cinq îles confère à chacune un caractère distinct. Des sommets glacés d'Hokkaido à la barrière de corail tropicale d'Okinawa, ces contrastes extrêmes font la beauté du Japon. Ce guide, qui contient plus de 800 photographies, illustrations et cartes, donne tous les renseignements pratiques pour découvrir ce pays. » --

title: Waaien, hard waaien
description: Bundel met twintig moderne, niet rijmende, langere en heel korte gedichten en achttien "namaak-kindertekeningen" in kleur. Vanaf ca. 11 jaar.

title: The facts about diabetes
description: Explains diabetes, its causes and treatment, and how people learn to live with the condition. Suggested level: primary, intermediate.

title: Zonder gezicht
description: Een Zweedse politie-inspecteur belandt totaal onvoorbereid in een moordzaak waarbij snel duidelijk wordt dat al zijn vroegere klasgenoten en hijzelf mogelijke slachtoffers zullen zijn.

title: La saga de la web multilingüe
description: Después de la invención de la web en 1990, los usuarios del internet cuya lengua materna no es el inglés alcanzan un 5% en 1994, un 20% en 1998, un 50% en 2000 y un 75% en 2015. Son muchos los que ayudan a promover su propia lengua y cultura y otras lenguas y culturas –a menudo en su tiempo libre y utilizando el inglés como lengua-puente– para que la web se vuelva realmente multilingüe. Este libro corto –basado en muchas entrevistas con profesionales de las lenguas y profesionales de la información– es un homenaje a su trabajo y su dedicación. Gracias a Anna Alvarez y a Alicia Simmross por su ayuda.

title: VIVO
description: The world of scholarship is changing rapidly. Increasing demands on scholars, the growing size and complexity of questions and problems to be addressed, and advances in sophistication of data collection, analysis, and presentation require new approaches to scholarship. A ubiquitous, open information infrastructure for scholarship, consisting of linked open data, open-source software tools, and a community committed to sustainability are emerging to meet the needs of scholars today. This book provides an introduction to VIVO, http://vivoweb.org/, a tool for representing information about research and researchers--their scholarly works, research interests, and organizational relationships. VIVO provides an expressive ontology, tools for managing the ontology, and a platform for using the ontology to create and manage linked open data for scholarship and discovery. Begun as a project at Cornell and further developed by an NIH funded consortium, VIVO is now being established as an open-source project with community participation from around the world. By the end of 2012, over 20 countries and 50 organizations will provide information in VIVO format on more than one million researchers and research staff, including publications, research resources, events, funding, courses taught, and other scholarly activity. The rapid growth of VIVO and of VIVO-compatible data sources speaks to the fundamental need to transform scholarship for the 21st century.

title: Animals
description: Presents black and white silhouettes of animals and images of animals arranged in patterns to depict other animals, including horses, deer, sea lions, cats, and rabbits.

title: Charles Dickens' Oliver Twist
description: Meet Oliver, Fagin, Nancy and the Artful Dodger in this accessible adaptation of Oliver Twist, illustrated throughout in Marcia's lively style.

title: Decorative arts
description: More than 100 objects from the Museum's collection of European decorative arts are featured, including masterpieces of furniture by André-Charles Boulle, tapestries from Gobelins, firedogs from Fontainebleau and a 17th-century ivory goblet.

title: De pientere kleuter
description: Pedagogische adviezen met betrekking tot kinderen van drie tot vijf jaar.

title: Flea
description: An introduction to fleas, including what they look like, how they are born, what they eat, how they grow, and where they live. Suggested level: junior, primary.

title: Introductory sociology
description: "The book consists of four sections. Part 1 introduces the reader to the essential principles of the sociological approach, part 2 examines the structures of inequality associated with class, race, gender and politics, part 3 explores other dimensions of social existence such as education, work, crime family, health among others and part 4 provides a full explanation and discussion of sociological theory and attempts to show the direction it is taking today"--Preface.

title: Jolly dictionary
description: This is a dictionary for children learning grammar and phonics.

title: Law for business studies students
description: This book provides a text on business law, relating the law to its use in practice. The book covers the legal system; business organisation and transactions, contract law, tort law, sale and supply of goods and services, insurance, export sales and corporate insolvency.

title: L'énergie au Québec
description: Quatorze jeunes chercheures et chercheurs s'interrogent sur les effets potentiels d'une application du concept de développement durable au secteur énergétique québécois. "Chiffres et faits à l'appui, ils situent les enjeux actuels et proposent des voies d'avenir."

title: Les Grecs
description: Sur les traces des anciens Grecs, de leurs origines à leur influence sur le monde romain. Tous les aspects de la civilisation grecque sont abordés : institutions civiles, religion, coutumes, vie quotidienne. Avec des portraits de politiciens et d'artistes qui ont contribué à la splendeur et au rayonnement de la culture hellénique.

title: Nightwoods
description: Charles Frazier, the author of National Book Award winning Cold Mountain, presents a new novel. In Nightwoods, Frazier envisions a late 1950s North Carolina through the eyes of Luce, a single woman who must care for the quiet twins of her murdered sister, Lily.

title: Military mavericks
description: This book describes the careers of some outstanding characters, introducing the readers to certain aspects of military history with which they may not be familiar. This book includes background information about their campaigns and also sufficient details about the characters to make them come alive.

title: 'A' for argonaut
description: Mack Maran, the most skilled op his nation ever had, stands outside the courthouse at Ft. Bragg, home of his "non-existent" unit. America's unsung hero has been betrayed, ambushed, and disgraced in a mission to rescue young American idealists held by African terrorists. His enemies, led by a major illegal arms dealer in league with Islamist terrorists, are cunning and treacherous. But they don't count on Maran's tenacity. He plans to hunt down the enemies who butchered his men, hobbled his health, and defiled his honor-and then kill them. He sets up his own spy firm and finds he's not a lone victim. The strong and independent diamond courier, Amber Chu, leads Mack on a race to free her kidnapped son and destroy their common enemy. Together they plunge through a maze of danger and intrigue to unravel a massive diamond scam that takes them from the U.S. Diamond Board, to the gemstone cutting tables of Antwerp, to the Congo-and back to the nation's capital. --P. [4] of cover.

title: Papier-carton
description: BRICOLAGE, CARTONNAGE, PAPIER, bricolage

title: Puppy care
description: Find out how to keep your puppy healthy and happy with this fully illustrated guide. It's packed with practical advice to help young owners care for their new pets. Puppy Care includes advice on what different breeds look like, how often a puppy should eat, and ways to help your puppy get all the exercise he needs. Each book is illustrated with warm, loving photography that encourages nurturing.

title: Reada's rescue
description: The life and adventures of an adorable little tiger shark pup that grows up off the coast of Florida to become Professor Clark who teaches others about the ocean ecosystems and their inhabitants.

title: Take a Chance
description: When Harlow Manning's rocker father goes on tour, he sends her to Rosemary Beach, Florida, to live with her half-sister, Nan. The problem: Nan despises her. Harlow has to keep her head down if she wants to get through the next nine months, which seems easy enough ... until gorgeous Grant Carter walks out of Nan's room. Grant made a huge mistake getting involved with a girl with venom in her veins. He'd known about Nan's reputation, but still couldn't resist her. Nothing makes him regret the fling more than meeting Harlow, who sends his pulse racing. Yet Harlow wants nothing to do with a guy who could fall for her wicked half-sister - even if there are no strings between Grant and Nan. Grant is desperate to redeem himself in Harlow's eyes, but did he ruin his chances with her before he even met her?

title: Thomas Quelque Chose
description: Littérature jeunesse: roman, frère, famille, secret

title: Tsjaad
description: Geschiedenis, politieke ontwikkelingen, economie en cultuur van Tsjaad.

title: The forgotten star
description: Intrigued by something missing from a patriotic display at the Smithsonian, Jim and Natalie set off to find clues to a mystery experts haven't been able to resolve regarding one of our nation's most revered symbols. Their journey takes them through three historic forts on the East Coast, along the back streets of Baltimore and Washington, D.C. and into a long forgotten subterranean vault which yields a discovery of immense significance.

title: Wake up ... moments of inspiration
description: It comes as if in a dream; it hits you when you least expect it. It is the culmination of study, or the result of crisis and fear. It is your Wake Up Moment. Inspirational speaker and teacher Steven E experienced his Wake Up Moment as a young man. The result was not an instant success story. What followed was years of hard work and occasional disappointment, but it was always accompanied by the sure knowledge that this was the right path for him. Dozens of like-minded coaches, teachers and entrepreneurs joined him on the pages of Wake Up Moments. Now, several business leaders, mentors and counselors have come together to examine the vital moment of personal epiphany in Wake Up Moments of Inspiration. Includes chapters by Dr. Wayne Dyer, Ernie Hudson, Zachery Levi, Liz Vassey and Brian Tracy.

title: Star Trek The Next Generation - Slings and Arrows - A Weary Life
description:
A new six-part epic covering the first year of service of the USS Enterprise-E, leading up to the events of the hit movie Star Trek: First Contact.
A team from the Enterprise – Riker, La Forge, and Daniels – is sent to deal with the latest threat from the Maquis. For La Forge and Daniels, it's just another mission, but Riker must face the specter of his transporter twin, Tom Riker, who left Starfleet to join the Maquis.
When the Enterprise team is caught between the Maquis and the Cardassians, Riker finds himself with an important decision to make – one that may affect his future in Starfleet…

title: Yong guo shu jiang xia nin de xue ya
description: Ben shu jie shao le gao xue ya de ji ben zhi shi, Xiang xi jie shao le duo zhong chang yong de fang zhi gao xue ya de guo shu yi ji guo shu shi liao yan fang, Mei fang jun fen shu yuan liao, Zhi zuo, Yong fa he gong xiao.

title: Awaken the devil
description: Fielding French knows she's stepping into murky waters when she agrees to prove enigmatic producer Chandler Bentley innocent of murdering his wife. Her promise to her dying uncle involves getting Bentley to trust her, to let her into his life, to tell his secrets. But as a dancer first and an amateur sleuth second, Fielding finds herself torn between the man who raised her and the dangerously seductive lure of the Devil of Broadway.

title: Tak niewielu
subjects: Great Britain. Royal Air Force. Fighter Command
description: The never-before-told story of the American pilots--idealists, adventurers, romantics--who joined the RAF before America entered the war and helped save Britain in its darkest hour. Eight young Americans joined Britain's Royal Air Force, defying their country's neutrality laws and risking their U.S. citizenship to fight side-by-side with England's finest pilots in the summer of 1940--over a year before America entered the war. Flying the lethal and elegant Spitfire, they became "knights of the air" and with minimal training but plenty of guts, they dueled the skilled and fearsome pilots of Germany's Luftwaffe. By October 1940, they had helped England win the greatest air battle in the history of aviation. Winston Churchill once said of all those who fought in the Battle of Britain, "Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few." These daring Americans were the few among the "few."--Publisher description.

title: A lovely skin, a rich inheritance
description: Small booklet advertising Maioline beauty products. The cover (brown ink on white paper) shows a middle eastern looking young woman holding a rose, her left arm raised, touching her neck. She is standing within a circular border with sprigs of apple blossom on either side.

title: Character quest
description: Character is not inherited; it doesn't "just happen." As you make your plans for the future, remember this important fact: Character must come before career! Character Quest will help you learn how the principles of God's Word can make a difference in your life.

title: Boston's budget problem in fiscal 1992
description: ...an overview of the city's fiscal 1992 situation; covers revenue loss (state aid, departmental revenues, free cash, other), property tax increases, fixed costs, departmental budgets and fiscal warnings...

title: Do you know your neighbors?
description: Packet consisting of "cover" leaflet listing "General Background" readings, enclosing four insert leaflets, listing readings on "American Indians," "American Jews," "American Negroes," and "Americans of Oriental Ancestry."

title: Eighty paces forward : a comprehensive study of open space, informal outdoor education and resident camping capital needs for non-profit agencies of metropolitan Boston
description: ...lists great ponds in MA; information on camping regulations of MA and the American Camping Association...

title: El Excmo. señor secretario de Estado y del Despacho Universal de Hacienda de orden de S.M. me previene con fecha 17. de enero de este año lo siguiente
description: A circular promoting the cultivation of cochineal cactus and insects.

title: Anjangsana
description:
“Jangan kecewa

Tuhan menciptakan cela

Pada sesuatu yang sangat kita cintai

Agar kita tak terjerumus pada pemberhalaan”

_______

Singkat kata, boleh jadi buku ini merupakan tafsir panjang dari kalimat pendek aku kangen kamu. Tapi apakah kalimat tersebut belumlah terang maksudnya sehingga harus dijelaskan secara panjang-lebar? Haduuh. Wong jomblo kontemporer saja sering sengaja salah memahami kalimat pendek yang diluncurkan perempuan barang misalnya “kamu terlalu baik untukku” sebagai pujian kok, apalagi ini persoalan fundamental. Bahwa persoalan kangen merupakan hal yang paling fundamental bagi seseorang yang masih beriman pada jarak.

Tak ada gagasan baru dalam buku ini, seperti halnya orang-orang terdahulu sudah merasakan kangen dan kini kita juga turut menyandang kangen. Apa yang saya tulis mungkin hanya merekonstruksi kalimatnya dengan tetap memakai gagasan para pendahulu, tetapi meski demikian ia harus tetap dituliskan demi melaksanakan repetisi. Sesuatu yang diulang bukan hanya memverifikasi bahwa sesuatu itu penting, melainkan juga menunjukkan bahwa kehidupan selalu mengandung unsur resonansi.

title: No. 70. Auction catalogue of United States coins of all series mostly uncirculated and proof, foreign crowns, foreign silver, choice medals ...
description: Contains American, Proof, World, Silver coins. Medals, numismatic literature.

title: Survey of Sangudo
description: General information on village of Sangudo.

title: Comment peindre ̉l'oriental
description: Conseils techniques et exercices pratiques, le tout abondamment illustr ̌de schm̌as et modl̈es.

title: Een heel bijzonder meisje
description: Alicia (ik-figuur) is elf als haar ouders zich aansluiten bij Casa Nostra. Onder de allesomvattende vleugels van Sofía leert ze de liefde kennen en het leven vieren. Totdat haar wonderland van de ene dag op de andere ophoudt te bestaan. Vanaf ca. 15 jaar.

title: A genealogical dictionary of the first settlers of New England
description:
"Three Generations of Those Who Came Before May, 1692, on the basis of Farmer's Register." 
An excellent directory of the first settlers of New England.

title: Holy days
description: Holy Days is about the sexual, psychological seduction of Gloria Wisher. Spanning 20 years, Gloria's story begins with her life as an innocent 3-year-old in a sensual and loving extended family of Italian-American grandparents in East Boston.

title: Grammaire pour adolescents
description: Destiné à un public d'adolescents débutants ou faux-débutants en français langue étrangère, cet ouvrage propose des exercices corrigés de compréhension et de mémorisation à travers des activités de déduction et de réemploi des notions grammaticales. Les chapitres sont encadrés par un bilan et un rappel. Les thèmes tiennent compte des centres d'intérêts des adolescents.

title: Fossil men and their modern representatives
description: This book is referred to and highly recommended by Arthur Custance in his work on Noah's Three Sons.

title: Return to Treasure Island
description: During a reunion with Jim Hawkins, Long John Silver tells of his tireless quest to recover the remaining treasure from Treasure Island.

title: The Berlin Wall
description: On the morning of August 13, 1961, the residents of East Berlin found themselves cut off from family, friends and jobs in the West by a tangle of barbed wire that ruthlessly cut a city of four million in two. Within days the barbed-wire entanglement would undergo an extraordinary metamorphosis: it became an imposing 103-mile-long wall guarded by three hundred watchtowers. A physical manifestation of the struggle between Soviet Communism and American capitalism—totalitarianism and freedom—that would stand for nearly thirty years, the Berlin Wall was the high-risk fault line between East and West on which rested the fate of all humanity. Many brave people risked their lives to overcome this lethal barrier, and some paid the ultimate price.In this captivating work, sure to be the definitive history on the subject, Frederick Taylor weaves together official history, archival materials and personal accounts to tell the complete story of the Wall's rise and fall, from the postwar political tensions that created a divided Berlin to the internal and external pressures that led to the Wall's demise. In addition, he explores the geopolitical ramifications as well as the impact the wall had on ordinary lives that is still felt today. For the first time the entire world faced the threat of imminent nuclear apocalypse, a fear that would be eased only when the very people the Wall had been built to imprison breached it on the historic night of November 9, 1989.Gripping and authoritative, The Berlin Wall is the first comprehensive account of a divided city and its people in a time when the world seemed to stand permanently on the edge of destruction.

title: Animals
description: Labeled pictures presents domestic and wild animals.

title: Two for the Money
description: A decades long blood feud turns into a bank heist turns into a series of double crosses with the heist money getting tossed around like a hot potato.

title: Understanding Medical Cannabis
description:
This accessible text provides trainee human service providers and those currently working in the field with a comprehensive, cutting-edge overview of topics related to the medical and therapeutic use of cannabis.

Employing an interdisciplinary, biopsychosocial framework, the book explores the different biological, cultural, and policy contexts of medical cannabis from a wide range of perspectives including practitioners, academics, and medical cannabis advocates. This book bridges the gap between theory and practice and underscores the urgent need for expanded and rigorous scientific research as medical cannabis is increasingly legalized, that may result in new cannabis-based medicines and help in identifying what health risks cannabis use may present.

Chapters are both evidence-based and practical, weaving in learning objectives, review questions, and varied case examples, all of which will prepare students and professionals for the reality of working with medical cannabis consumers.—Publisher

title: Take Your Breath Away
description:
One weekend, while Andrew Mason was on a fishing trip, his wife, Brie, vanished without a trace. Most people assumed Andy had got away with murder, but the police couldn’t build a strong case against him. For a while, Andy hit rock bottom – he drank too much, was abandoned by his friends, nearly lost his business and became a pariah in the place he had once called home.

Now, six years later, Andy has put his life back together. He’s sold the house he shared with Brie and moved away for a fresh start. When he hears his old house has been bulldozed and a new house built in its place, he’s not bothered. He’s settled with a new partner, Jayne, and life is good.

But Andy’s peaceful world is about to shatter. One day, a woman shows up at his old address, screaming, ‘Where’s my house? What’s happened to my house?' And then, just as suddenly as she appeared, the woman – who bears a striking resemblance to Brie – is gone. The police are notified and old questions – and dark suspicions – resurface.

Could Brie really be alive after all these years? If so, where has she been? It soon becomes clear that Andy’s future, and the lives of those closest to him, depends on discovering what the hell is going on. The trick will be whether he can stay alive long enough to unearth the answers...

title: Australia's Battlefields in Viet Nam
description: A traveller's guide to the Australian battlefields and cemeteries in Viet Nam written for people actually holidaying in Viet Nam as well as the wannabes who think they might go to Viet Nam.; Being there 30 years on, standing on the fields of conflict, it all came rushing back. The good bits and the bad bits. But it left me with a feeling of comradeship and pride. I was glad that I made the journey. In 1971 Gary McKay was an Australian platoon commander in what was then South Viet Nam and was seriously wounded in one of Australia s major battles of the Viet Nam War. In 2002 he returned to Viet Nam and retraced the steps of the men who had gone before and after him, from 1965 to the end of the war in 1972, in what was Australia s longest lasting war.Now, in this book, Gary McKay presents an essential guide to the battlefields in Viet Nam for today s traveller. He provides practical tips on how to get to each site, what to look for and how to avoid the pitfalls of journeying in Viet Nam. Along the way, he chronicles the major battles fought by the 1st Australian Task Force, accompanied by gripping narratives of the actions.Illustrated with photos and maps, this book is a must for Australian travellers to Viet Nam who want to learn more about the conflict that cost so many lives on both sides.

title: Economic Geology of the South Pass Granite-Greenstone Belt, Southern Wind River Range, Western Wyoming
description:
South Pass is Wyoming's primary source for gold and iron ore and represents a classical greenstone belt that has been intensely folded and faulted. The author spent 6 years mapping this complex terrain and found more than 100 gold anomalies as well as the tectonic control for ore shoots.  In recent years, this terrain has become a popular place to search for gold deposits.

The book was published prior the the WGS providing ISBN numbers, but has remained one of the more popular books at the Wyoming Geological Survey. It is available at the WGS publications section.

title: K̲h̲vājah Sayyid Fak̲h̲ruddīn Ḥusain Suk̲h̲an Dihlavī
description: Life and works of K̲h̲vājah Sayyid Fak̲h̲ruddīn Ḥusain Suk̲h̲an Dihlavī, 1839-1900, Urdu and Persian poet.

title: Saundaryabodhaśāstrīya viśvakośa kī bhūmikā
description: On the origin and development of aesthetics in India.

title: Ishvara jo āpghāt
description: A collection of satirical poems.

title: Banditā Kamalālaẏā
description: Works of Kamalālaẏa Kākati, 1894-1946, Assamese author, editor of Ghara-jeuti, Assamese periodical on women, and women social reformer; includes compilation of articles and reminiscences on her by close associates and authors; published on the occasion of the birth centenary of Kakati, during 50th bi-annual conference of Sadau Asama Lekhikā Samāroha Samiti, held at Nāzira, 1994.

title: Kirān̐ta sambandhī kehī carcā
description: On Kiranti, a community of Nepal.

title: Aḥyāʼe millat aur dīnī jamāʻaten̲
description: Historical study on the role of religious parties in building Muslim nation.

title: Indiyayuṭe nētr̲aṅṅaḷ
description: Biography of people from various walks of life from India.

title: Jaina gurjara kavio
description: Study on and descriptive catalogue of Gujarati Jaina poets and their works.

title: 75 nhacʻ mrokʻ Mranʻ māʹ Rupʻ rhaṅʻ Cinʻ Ratu Sabhaṅʻ, 1920-1995, dhātʻ puṃ mhatʻ tamʻʺ
description: Celebrating the 75 years of motion picture industry in Burma; comprises addresses, articles, and pictures of the celebrations.

title: Alt̤āf Ḥusain
description: On the life and political career of Alt̤āf Ḥussain, 1953- exiled leader of MQM; includes facsimile reproduction of some confidential documents.

title: Estetika pedalangan
description: Aesthetics of the puppetry in Indonesia.

title: Jongensjaren
description: Tim (14) verhuist met zijn broers en ouders naar een kleiner huis. Het is daar passen en meten, waarbij de nodige conflictsituaties ontstaan. Vanaf ca. 12 jaar.

title: Érasme et le grelot de la folie
description:
Permettre aux lecteurs de s'immerger dans l'univers des grands penseurs tout en découvrant leur vie, leur oeuvre et leur vision du monde: telle est l'ambition de cette collection destinée aux 9-14 ans. Chaque titre recourt ainsi à une trame voisinant plus ou moins la fiction afin d'illustrer le cheminement d'un philosophe ayant marqué son époque. Dans cet opus: à la veille du discours qu'il doit prononcer devant les professeurs de la Sorbonne, qui décideront si on lui accorde ou non le titre de maître, Érasme voit surgir devant lui une femme vêtue d'un costume de bouffon orné de grelots. Se faisant appeler Marotte, sa visiteuse affirme: "Avant de philosopher, il faut vivre! Avant d'être sage, il faut être fou. Avant de penser, il faut se dépenser" (p. 22). Et la voilà qui l'entraîne dans un voyage nocturne sur un tapis volant, direction le désert. En lui racontant notamment l'histoire de la tour de Babel, son interlocutrice démontre au philosophe que la folie régit le monde en prenant différentes formes: l'avarice, la cupidité, la colère, la gourmandise, etc. Ayant réalisé que "l'histoire des hommes est l'histoire de leurs guerres" (p. 38), Érasme décide de faire non pas l'éloge de la philosophie et de la sagesse comme il le projetait, mais bien celui de la folie afin d'offrir aux hommes un miroir reflétant véritablement ce qu'ils sont. Ceci tout en étant conscient que "le plus fou [est] celui qui se croit sage" (p. 62) ... [SDM].

Un ouvrage de gai savoir porté par un texte pimpant, festival de jeux de mots et de bonne humeur qui sied parfaitement aux fondements de la pensée du philosophe, qui est exposée de manière plutôt limpide. L'album s'inscrit cependant dans une collection quelque peu mal ciblée, la facture des ouvrages risquant de rebuter les élèves du secondaire tandis que les concepts abordés dans le texte sont très complexes pour les plus jeunes. Un outil que l'on réservera dans le cadre d'animations, d'ateliers ou de débats effectués en classe sous la gouverne d'un mentor à même d'apporter les éclaircissements nécessaires à une bonne compréhension et à l'assimilation de la théorie. Des collages stylisés aux couleurs toniques illustrent le tout dans un débordement de fantaisie en campant les protagonistes vêtus de culottes bouffantes à la manière des fous du roi dans un décor moyenâgeux empreint d'une atmosphère de carnaval. [SDM].

title: Barbecue
description: Propose 100 recettes de grillades issues du monde entier : brochettes de porc à l'indonésienne, kefta d'agneau, ailes de poulet tex-mex, poisson enrobé d'épices à la créole ..., mais aussi des recettes de marinades, de coulis, de garnitures de légumes et de desserts. Donne des conseils sur le combustible et passe en revue les accessoires essentiels, les techniques d'allumage et de nettoyage.

title: Androcles and the lion
description: "One dark night, a slave escapes his mean master. His life changes when he meets a lion in the woods. Read to learn about true friendship."--Back cover.

title: The sled the brothers made
description: Recalls the experiences of the two young Wright brothers who were introduced to principles of aerodynamics while building a toy sled.

title: Pic nic
description: 'Picnic' is the compilation of the best works from the new-wave of international young artists setting new directions in modernist and folkloric illustration.

title: Het lied van de raaf
description:
Twee kinderen, die de Zweedse jaarmarkten afstruinen, ontmoeten allerlei vreemde mensen en vragen zich af of 'de raaf' gelijk krijgt met zijn lied over een onleefbaar leven in deze wereld.

De 14-jarige David (ik-figuur) trekt met zijn zusje en zijn vader langs Zweedse jaarmarkten om worst te verkopen. Hij komt allerlei vreemde mensen tegen en probeert uit te vinden of 'de raaf' gelijk krijgt met zijn lied over een onleefbaar leven in deze wereld. Vanaf ca. 15 jaar.

title: La petite sirene
description: Serie "Je sais lire", niveau 3 "

title: Vertrouwen
description: Korte overdenkingen voor elke dag, samengesteld uit het werk van de Belgische kardinaal Danneels.

A better time for your business starts in the next decade.Are you ready?In this fast and furious time machine of a book, Richard Laermer shows you how to use-and in some cases abuse-the trends of the next decade (or two) that really matter. As an author with a functional crystal ball, a veteran marketing innovator, and media master, Laermer foresees a fabulous future-if you start planning for it today.Sometimes you see a business evolve and think, 'I wish I'd thought of that.' With his trademark razor-sharp style, Laermer reveals the most functional forecasting secrets of professional trendspotters. Divided into nine categories, with more than 72 'short-short' chapters and dozens of outrageous sidebars, this captivating book shows you the ways to:Read the signsInfluence the trendsEmbrace new and reject stodgyAnticipate changeAsk experts the right questionsSeek out visionaries and snub fakersSeparate the trends from fadsUse technology-for everythingCash in on being ahead of the competition! 2011: Trendspotting for the Next Decade is packed with eye-popping predictions (and realities) on how you'll live, work, play, buy, sell, talk, text, laugh, and more. You'll discover how miniscule attention spans will increase a need for velocity...how to work while you're sleeping...how to wash off mediocrity...and why today's communication devices will become obsolete. With 2011you'll learn how to participate in change instead of trailing it.Laermer calls trends as he sees 'em - from what's dead to what's sensational to what's novel and what's next. If you're looking for surprising observations, shocking statistics, sublime insights, and wholesome food for thought--read this book. Because this is your life...in 2011.

title: Heksenmeisje
description: Teinaki (ik-figuur) is voorbestemd om hoofdheks te worden. Eerst moet ze zonder toverkracht een paar moeilijke opdrachten vervullen. Vanaf ca. 9 jaar.

title: User involvement in cancer care
description: This is a study of the impact and extent of user involvement on planning, delivering and evaluating cancer care services.

title: Het zal je maar gebeuren
description: Enkele gezinnen in Alkmaar kopen een lot voor De Straatloterij in de hoop een grote slag te slaan.

title: Pudgy
description: Pudgy, a puppy nobody will play with, and Lucy, a girl nobody will play with, meet and stay together.

title: Tinka
description: Tinka woont samen met haar ouders en haar vriend Branko in een belegerde stad in een Balkanland, waar zij ondanks de oorlog, er het beste van probeert te maken. Vanaf ca. 10 jaar.

title: The American Indian
description: In the winter of 2012/2013, De Nieuwe Kerk in Amsterdam is hosting an exhibition about the artistic traditions of American Indians, the indigenous peoples of the North American continent. Exploring seven different regions, the exhibition will paint a picture of the rich and diverse arts and cultures of these Native American peoples.
